Replace.Text: Naval ranged units grant +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength to adjacent naval melee, raider and transport units; naval melee, raider and transport units grant +2 [ICON_Range] range to adjacent naval ranged units

Every 25 rounds, you will get a negative effect and a positive effect, which will last until 200 rounds; you will get an [ICON_RESOURCE_SPECTER_ANTIDOTE] potion every round; every time a 25 round node is reached, when the [ICON_RESOURCE_SPECTER_SAN] light value is 2, You can use 35 [ICON_RESOURCE_SPECTER_ANTIDOTE] potions to suppress negative effects, but this will also weaken your positive effects; when the light value of [ICON_RESOURCE_SPECTER_SAN] is 1, you can use 35 [ICON_RESOURCE_SPECTER_ANTIDOTE] potions to strengthen your positive effects, but your Negative effects are also enhanced
...Listen, Lord of all things, in the dark, muttering to himself...
Likes civilizations with high culture values, dislikes civilizations with low culture values

Symptoms are controlled by the number of rounds, which are triggered every 25 rounds and end at 200 rounds; potions are used to suppress items or upgrade symptoms, each time 35 are needed; lights control the appearance of suppressed or upgraded items. For example, when the light value is 2 at 25 rounds, the first symptom and suppression item will appear, and when the light value is 1, the first symptom and upgrade item will appear, if the light value is not 2 or 1 at 25 rounds , the item will not appear [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]25 rounds, Killing: Productivity +50% when producing military units, civilian units -50%; suppress killing: +20% productivity of military units; upgrade killing: produce military units Productivity +70% for unit, civilian unit -70%, unit +5 combat power [NEWLINE] 50 rounds, worship: each population +1 faith, -1 productivity; suppress worship: each population +0.5 faith; upgrade worship: each population Personal population +2 Faith, -3 Productivity, Faith can be used to buy units [NEWLINE] 75 rounds, Chaos: All units +1 movement, -30% culture and faith; Suppress Chaos: All units +1 movement; upgrade Chaos: All units +1 movement, sea units +1 movement -40% culture value and faith value [NEWLINE] 100 rounds, confusion: get a governor title, all cities -1 habitability; restrain confusion: all cities + 4 Loyalty, now you have cleared the clouds and found the meaning of being a member of the Deep Sea Hunter, and unlocked the builder’s ability to improve the stronghold of the Deep Sea Hunter; upgrade to Confused: All cities +1 livability, now you go deep into the unknown and discover the deep sea church The meaning of membership, unlocking the builder’s ability to improve the Church of the Deep Sea[NEWLINE] Completion of each subsequent project will give the Deep Sea Hunter stronghold +2 cultural value or the Deep Sea Church +2 faith value[NEWLINE] 125 rounds, raving: all cities Construct Theater Square +50% Productivity -6 Loyalty; Suppress Whispering: Build Theater Square and its buildings in all cities +20% Productivity; Upgrade Whispering: Build Theater Square and its buildings in all cities +70% Productivity, Great Artist Points +20% , -8 Loyalty [NEWLINE] 150 rounds, old dream: +50% productivity when building wonders, -50% productivity when building buildings or areas; suppress old dreams: +20% productivity when building wonders; upgrade old dreams: +70% productivity when building wonders Productivity, -70% Productivity when constructing buildings or areas [NEWLINE] Turn 175, Exhaustion: Sculpture +6 Culture, Great Artist Points -30%; Suppress Exhaustion: Sculpture +4 Culture; Upgrade Exhaustion: Sculpture +6 Culture, +2 Faith , Great artist points -60% [NEWLINE] 200 rounds, dream awakening: get 1000 culture value and technology value - 1000 faith value [NEWLINE] Here, the ghost shark wakes up, when the light value is 3, she can choose her own The road of self-embracing: Buildings and wonders with more than 2 slots will automatically get the theme [NEWLINE] When all the slots are filled, the suppression item--Hug the hunter is the suppression item: deep-sea hunter stronghold +2 productivity, all units get The life value is automatically restored, and the recovery amount is +5 [NEWLINE] Upgrade item - Embrace the Church: Deep Sea Church +2 Faith Points, you can use Faith Points to buy buildings in the city center, port and theater square
When she prayed, the stars ceased to twinkle, and when she wept, the night smiled, and when she lamented, pain spread in her madness
Ghost sharks prefer civilizations with high culture
Ghost sharks prefer civilizations with high culture
Ghost Sharks don't like civilizations with low culture
Ghost Sharks don't like civilizations with low culture
Productivity +70% when producing military units, -70% for civilian units, +5 combat power for military units
Each population has +2 faith, -3 production, can buy units with faith value
All units +1 movement, sea units +1 movement -40% culture value and faith value
+1 Amenity for all cities Now you've delved into the unknown and discovered what it means to be a member of the Church of the Deep
+4 Loyalty to all cities Now you have lifted the clouds and discovered what it means to be a member of the Deep Sea Hunter
Build Theater Square and its buildings in all cities +70% Production Great Artist Points +20% -8 Loyalty
All cities build theater squares and their buildings +20% production
+70% Production when constructing Wonders -70% Production when constructing buildings or districts
Sculpture +6 Culture +2 Faith Great Artist Points -60%
Buildings and wonders with more than 2 slots will automatically get a theme when all slots are filled
Church of the Deep +2 Faith Points, you can use Faith Points to buy buildings in the city center, port and theater square
Deep sea hunter stronghold +2 productivity, all units get automatic recovery of health, and the recovery amount +5
Argol Tactics: +5 combat strength for adjacent naval melee, raider and transport units
Argol Tactics: Adjacent naval ranged units +2 range
Haizi destroyed their hometown, they can only reach the land to seek refuge
Statue of Master of the Deep Ocean

Cities with [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] barracks and no [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square have +20% [ICON_Production] production, the city's deep sea hunter stronghold +2 production, naval units produced +1 [ICON_Movement] movement speed and 10 [ICON_Damaged] life recovery ;[NEWLINE]Cities with [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] theater square and no [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] barracks +20% [ICON_Culture] culture, the city's deep sea hunter stronghold +2 [ICON_Culture] culture, sculpture +2 [ICON_Culture] culture and 100% [ ICON_Tourism] Tourism Performance
Unlocks the Builder's ability to build a Deep Sea Hunter Stronghold
Gain 4 Argol remnants at the start of the game, these remnants carry the Argol artwork that Ghost Shark likes
Take control of your mind and find your self
Control your symptoms according to the direction of the plan
Choose War or Art to Play Specialization
According to the direction of the plan, use your expertise

I know you and you know me, we should save the boring "meeting first". But you don't know me yet, and I don't know you. As far as I can remember, the way people on land get to know each other is not confusing, so let's talk.
This will be a road full of sacrifices.

Even though there are many things that make me dissatisfied, you have not given up on the collection and preservation of art. This alone is enough to make me put away all my complaints. Put your work down, this is one production you should definitely not miss.
You want to hear me sing? Of course I can satisfy you. But unfortunately, singing has a more special meaning to us than you can appreciate because you are not one of us.
They must be made to pay... must...
Let me try, can you help or hinder me.
If you want me to be your chat partner, please at least come up with some topics that interest me.
Just relying on your frail body, you will be submerged by the tide. But you are also lucky because I invite you to hide behind me.
I have no interest in things of no value.
I have no interest in things of no value.
In your dreams, there are often incomprehensible things, don't they? Oh, those scenes are hopeless letters delivered to you by that person. And I, as the emissary of that person, sent it, hehe...
I have no interest in things of no value. (condemns you)
I know all about what you want.
I'm in a good mood right now...very good!
Can we agree that the armies of both sides march peacefully in their respective lands?
Your intellectual curiosity is strong, but sometimes lacks direction.
